title:
The motivic fundamental group of a punctured elliptic curve and
  algebraic cycles
abstract:
In this paper, we consider the motivic fundamental group of the punctured
elliptic curves as a DG complex in the DG category of elliptic motives and
describe its resolution via Schur complexes. During this process, we find the
algebraic cycles analogous to the Bloch-Totaro cycles.
